title: Missed prayer in congregation - how to pray at home?
transcript: the first question is if someone misses the firt Salah in Congregation for a legitimate reason and he is about to pray home then the sequence remains he prays the Sunnah the fart then the sooner afterwards and this is for the Lord so he prays to then another - this is sooner before lure for raka of the  after doing a comma then - raka after the for sooner this is providing that the time is open and a sore thumb is not squeezing in so in normal cases yes this is what you should do
